Save yourself the trouble and look elsewhere!

I'll follow up with this review in a week. The watch is really beautiful, maybe a little gaudy but I like it. Took 3 minutes to set the time, (I set the little clock by turning crown counterclockwise & matched the time with the main clock), and it's a joy getting mesmerized by while watching it. Nothing about it screams piece of shit, so I'm hoping that with a little care it will stand up to the test of time. When I update this review I'll be focusing on time accuracy when doing the daily winding that it says to do for the first week.  So far I see no red flags, and after having a smart watch that seemed to be dead more often than not I'm really stoked to have a good ol' analog wrist watch again.

评论概述: A cheap Chinese copy of a beautiful German original
评论详情: This is a beautiful watch, and I still plan on wearing it using the small secondary time dial while that continues working.  I say "small secondary time dial" because it is cheaply made. After about a month of use, I noticed that it sometimes kept time and sometimes went wildly inaccurate.  When I went to correct the time, I noticed that sometimes when the minute hand *should* have passed the hour hand the two became stuck and the minute hand dragged the hour hand further. So every few days the time displayed by the main watch became what in AI is called a hallucination.  I'd love to have the German original for this watch.
